title: Standard Shipping Options
content:
**Free Standard Shipping**
                - Free on orders over $50
                - Delivery in 5-7 business days
                - Available to all US addresses
                
                **Expedited Shipping**
                - $9.99 flat rate
                - Delivery in 2-3 business days
                - Available Monday-Friday
                
                **Express Shipping**
                - $19.99 flat rate
                - Next business day delivery
                - Order by 2 PM EST for next-day delivery

title: International Shipping
content:
**International Delivery**
                We ship to over 100 countries worldwide.
                
                **Shipping Costs**
                - Calculated based on destination and weight
                - Typically $15-$45 for standard international shipping
                - Express international available for $35-$75
                
                **Delivery Times**
                - Standard International: 7-21 business days
                - Express International: 3-7 business days
                
                **Customs & Duties**
                - Customer responsible for customs fees and duties
                - Items may be subject to inspection delays
                - We provide all necessary customs documentation

title: 30-Day Return Policy
content:
**Return Window**
                - Most items can be returned within 30 days of delivery
                - Items must be in original condition with tags attached
                - Original packaging required for electronics
                
                **Return Process**
                1. Log into your account and go to Order History
                2. Select the item you want to return
                3. Choose your return reason
                4. Print the prepaid return label
                5. Package the item securely
                6. Drop off at any authorized shipping location
                
                **Refund Timeline**
                - Refunds processed within 3-5 business days of receipt
                - Original payment method will be credited
                - Shipping costs are non-refundable (unless item is defective)

title: Exchange Policy
content:
**Size & Color Exchanges**
                - Free exchanges for different sizes or colors
                - Must be within 30 days of delivery
                - Original item must be in new condition
                
                **Exchange Process**
                1. Initiate exchange through your account
                2. We'll send you the new item immediately
                3. Return the original item using provided label
                4. No additional charges for size/color exchanges
                
                **Product Upgrades**
                - Exchange for higher-priced item: pay the difference
                - Exchange for lower-priced item: receive refund difference
                - Price differences calculated at time of original purchase

title: Electronics Care & Maintenance
content:
**General Electronics Care**
                - Keep devices away from extreme temperatures
                - Avoid exposure to moisture and humidity
                - Use original chargers and accessories when possible
                - Clean with dry, lint-free cloth only
                
                **Battery Care**
                - Don't let batteries completely drain regularly
                - Avoid overcharging (unplug when fully charged)
                - Store devices with 50% charge if not using for extended periods
                - Replace batteries when performance significantly decreases
                
                **Screen Care**
                - Use screen protectors to prevent scratches
                - Clean with microfiber cloth in circular motions
                - Avoid harsh chemicals or abrasive materials
                - Don't press hard on touchscreens

title: Clothing Care Instructions
content:
**Reading Care Labels**
                - Always check care labels before washing
                - Follow temperature and cycle recommendations
                - Pay attention to drying instructions
                - Note any special requirements (dry clean only, etc.)
                
                **Washing Guidelines**
                - Separate colors: whites, lights, darks
                - Use appropriate water temperature
                - Don't overload washing machine
                - Turn delicate items inside out
                
                **Drying Best Practices**
                - Air dry when possible to prevent shrinkage
                - Use low heat settings for machine drying
                - Remove promptly to prevent wrinkles
                - Hang or lay flat for delicate items

title: Warranty Coverage & Terms
content:
**Standard Warranty Coverage**
                - Electronics: 1-2 years manufacturer warranty
                - Appliances: 1-3 years depending on product
                - Clothing: 90 days against manufacturing defects
                - Home goods: 1 year limited warranty
                
                **What's Covered**
                - Manufacturing defects
                - Material failures under normal use
                - Functional problems not caused by user damage
                - Parts and labor (varies by product)
                
                **What's NOT Covered**
                - Accidental damage or misuse
                - Normal wear and tear
                - Damage from improper care or storage
                - Cosmetic damage that doesn't affect function

title: How do I create an account?
content:
Creating an account is easy and free:
                1. Click "Sign Up" in the top right corner
                2. Enter your email address and create a password
                3. Verify your email address by clicking the link we send you
                4. Complete your profile with shipping and billing information
                
                **Benefits of having an account:**
                - Faster checkout process
                - Order tracking and history
                - Wishlist and saved items
                - Exclusive member offers
                - Easy returns and exchanges

title: How do I track my order?
content:
You can track your order by:
                1. Logging into your account
                2. Going to Order History
                3. Clicking on the tracking number
                4. You'll see real-time updates on your package location
                
                **Tracking Information Includes:**
                - Order confirmation and processing status
                - Shipping carrier and tracking number
                - Estimated delivery date
                - Delivery confirmation
                
                You'll also receive tracking updates via email and SMS (if enabled).

title: What payment methods do you accept?
content:
**Credit & Debit Cards:**
                - Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover
                - All major international cards accepted
                - Secure processing with encryption
                
                **Digital Wallets:**
                - PayPal and PayPal Credit
                - Apple Pay (on compatible devices)
                - Google Pay (on compatible devices)
                - Amazon Pay
                
                **Other Options:**
                - Buy now, pay later with Klarna or Afterpay
                - Gift cards and store credit
                - Corporate accounts for business customers

title: Is my personal information secure?
content:
**Data Protection:**
                - All personal information encrypted and secure
                - We never sell your information to third parties
                - Strict access controls for employee data access
                - Regular security audits and updates
                
                **Security Measures:**
                - 256-bit SSL encryption for all data transmission
                - Two-factor authentication available
                - Regular password security checks
                - Automatic logout for inactive sessions
                
                **Your Privacy Rights:**
                - View and update your information anytime
                - Delete your account and data upon request
                - Opt out of marketing communications
                - Control cookie preferences

title: Website Troubleshooting
content:
**Common Issues and Solutions:**
                
                **Can't log in to your account:**
                - Check that you're using the correct email address
                - Try resetting your password
                - Clear your browser cache and cookies
                - Disable browser extensions temporarily
                
                **Page won't load or loads slowly:**
                - Check your internet connection
                - Try refreshing the page
                - Clear your browser cache
                - Try a different browser or device
                
                **Can't add items to cart:**
                - Make sure the item is in stock
                - Check if you're logged in
                - Clear browser cookies
                - Try using a different browser
                
                **Payment not processing:**
                - Verify your payment information is correct
                - Check with your bank for any blocks
                - Try a different payment method
                - Contact customer service for assistance
